scripts.install:all: yarn && yarn install && cd devops/functions/pdfGenerator && yarn install
scripts.development:invoke:migrateUp: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke -s development --function migration --config serverless-functions.ts
scripts.development:invoke:migrateDown: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke -s development --function migration --data 'down' --config serverless-functions.ts
scripts.integrations:invoke:migrateUp: NODE_ENV=integrations sls invoke -s integrations --function migration --config serverless-functions.ts
scripts.integrations:invoke:migrateDown: NODE_ENV=integrations sls invoke -s integrations --function migration --data 'down' --config serverless-functions.ts
scripts.staging:invoke:migrateUp: NODE_ENV=staging sls invoke -s staging --function migration --config serverless-functions.ts
scripts.staging:invoke:migrateDown: NODE_ENV=staging sls invoke -s staging --function migration --data 'down' --config serverless-functions.ts
scripts.global:redeploy: tag=GLOBAL_DEPLOYMENT && git tag -d ${tag} && git push --delete origin ${tag}  && git tag ${tag}  && git push origin ${tag}
scripts.production:invoke:migrateUp: NODE_ENV=production sls invoke -s production --function migration --config serverless-functions.ts
scripts.production:invoke:migrateDown: NODE_ENV=production sls invoke -s production --function migration --data 'down' --config serverless-functions.ts
scripts.local: NODE_ENV=development DISABLE_CRON=1 SLS_DEBUG=* serverless offline start -s development --ignoreJWTSignature --noTimeout --reloadHandler --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:prod: NODE_ENV=development  DISABLE_CRON=1 serverless offline start -s development --ignoreJWTSignature --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:postSignUp: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function cognitoPostSignUpFunction --path ./devops/local/postSignUpRequest.json --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:pdfGenerator: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function pdfGenerator --path ./devops/local/pdfGeneratorEvent.json --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:firebase: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function firebase --path ./devops/local/firebasePushNotificationEvent.json --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:cronDividendsCalculation: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function cronDividendsCalculation --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:cronNotificationsFunction: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function cronNotificationsFunction --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:cronDividendsDistribution: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function cronDividendsDistribution --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:cronRecurringInvestments: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function cronRecurringInvestments --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:cronPushEveryDay: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function cronPushEveryDay --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:cronDealpathSyncFunction: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function cronDealpathSyncFunction --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:migrateUp: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function migration --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.local:invoke:migrateDown: NODE_ENV=development sls invoke local -s development --function migration --data 'down' --config serverless-local.ts
scripts.development:redeploy:saas: tag=DEVELOPMENT_SAAS_DEPLOYMENT && git tag -d ${tag} && git push --delete origin ${tag}  && git tag ${tag}  && git push origin ${tag}
scripts.integrations:redeploy:saas: tag=INTEGRATIONS_SAAS_DEPLOYMENT && git tag -d ${tag} && git push --delete origin ${tag}  && git tag ${tag}  && git push origin ${tag}
scripts.staging:redeploy:saas: tag=STAGING_SAAS_DEPLOYMENT && git tag -d ${tag} && git push --delete origin ${tag}  && git tag ${tag}  && git push origin ${tag}
scripts.production:redeploy:saas: tag=PRODUCTION_SAAS_DEPLOYMENT && git tag -d ${tag} && git push --delete origin ${tag}  && git tag ${tag}  && git push origin ${tag}
scripts.api-doc: yarn codegen && yarn magidoc generate && yarn magidoc preview
scripts.admin-api-doc: yarn codegen && yarn magidoc generate -f magidoc-admin.mjs && yarn magidoc preview -f magidoc-admin.mjs
